## Problem 1

First we start with creating a data frame:

```{r}
prob1_df = tibble (
  vec_runif = runif(10, min = 0, max = 5), 
  vec_logical = c(vec_runif > 2), 
  vec_char = c("p8105", "data", "science", "is", "great", 
               "my", "name", "is", "guojing", "wu"), 
  vec_factor = factor(c(1, 2, 3, 1, 2, 3, 1, 2, 3, 1))
)
```
